sourcesContent:
// HackBrew.js

import React from 'react';
import { Box, Heading, Text, VStack, Progress, Button, Grid, GridItem, HStack } from '@chakra-ui/react';
const HackBrew = () => {
  const satisfactionRate = 100; // Adjust as needed

  return (
    <Box id="hack-brew" py={10} px={5} bg="#F5F5F5">
      <VStack spacing={6} align="start" maxW="800px" mx="auto" color="gray.800">
        <Heading as="h2" size="xl" mb={4}>
          Hack Brew: Promoting Inclusivity in Tech
        </Heading>
        <Text fontSize="lg" mb={4}>
          Hack Brew is a pioneering hackathon dedicated to fostering inclusivity
          within the tech community. It provides a platform for participants to
          innovate, collaborate, and showcase their talents.
        </Text>
        <Text fontWeight="bold" fontSize="lg">
          Participant Satisfaction:
        </Text>
        <Progress
          value={satisfactionRate}
          colorScheme="teal"
          size="lg"
          width="100%"
          mb={4}
        />
        <Text fontSize="lg" mb={4}>
          {satisfactionRate}% of participants would love to come back and
          recommend to a friend.
        </Text>
        <HStack spacing={4}>
          <Button 
          as="a"
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener noreferrer"
          href="https://www.hackbrew.tech"
          bg="teal.400" size="lg">
            View the Website
          </Button>
          <Button 
          as="a"
          href="https://hack-brew.devpost.com/project-gallery"
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener noreferrer"
          bg="teal.400" size="lg"
         _hover={{ transform: "scale(1.05)", bg: "gray.400" }} >
            View Project Gallery
          </Button>
        </HStack>
        <Text fontSize="lg" mt={6}>
          Join us in the next Hack Brew and be a part of a vibrant community
          driving innovation and inclusivity in technology!
        </Text>
        <Box 
    textAlign="center"
    transition="all 0.3s"
    _hover={{ boxShadow: 'lg', bg:"teal.200"}}
        bg="gray.100" p={6} shadow="md" borderWidth="1px" borderRadius="md" w="100%" mt={8}>
          <Grid templateColumns="repeat(3, 1fr)" gap={6}>
            <GridItem>
              <Box bg="white" p={4} borderWidth="1px" borderRadius="md" textAlign="center">
                <Text fontWeight="bold" fontSize="2xl">400+</Text>
                <Text fontSize="lg">Participant</Text>
              </Box>
            </GridItem>
            <GridItem>
            <Box bg="white" p={4} borderWidth="1px" borderRadius="md" textAlign="center">
                <Text fontWeight="bold" fontSize="2xl">100+</Text>
                <Text fontSize="lg">Colleges</Text>
              </Box>
            </GridItem>
            <GridItem>
            <Box bg="white" p={4} borderWidth="1px" borderRadius="md" textAlign="center">
                <Text fontWeight="bold" fontSize="2xl">40+</Text>
                <Text fontSize="lg">Projects</Text>
              </Box>
            </GridItem>
          </Grid>
        </Box>
      </VStack>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default HackBrew;
